Flashback!

Conferences (Chronological Order)

Mayur Deshpande, Abhishek Amit, Mason Chang, Nalini Venkatasubramanian and Sharad Mehrotra. Flashback: A Peer-to-Peer Webserver for Handling Flash Crowds IEEE International Conference on Distributed Computing Systems (ICDCS). 2007.

Bo Xing, Mayur Deshpande, Nalini Venkatasubramanian and Sharad Mehrotra. Towards Reliable Application Data Broadcast in Wireless Ad Hoc Networks IEEE Wireless Communications and Networking Conference (WCNC). 2007.

Qi Zhong, Iosif Lazaridis, Mayur Deshpande, Chen Li, Sharad Mehrotra, Hal Stern. Supporting Approximate Similarity Queries with Quality Guarantees in P2P Systems IEEE International Conference on Management of Data (COMAD). 2006.

Mayur Deshpande, Nalini Venkatasubramanian And Sharad Mehrotra. Heuristics for Flash-Dissemination in Heterogenous Networks IEEE International Conference on High Performance Computing (HiPC). 2006.

Mayur Deshpande, Bo Xing, Iosif Lazardis, Bijit Hore, Nalini Venkatasubramanian And Sharad Mehrotra. CREW: A Gossip-based Flash-Dissemination System IEEE International Conference on Distributed Computing Systems (ICDCS). 2006.

Mayur Deshpande, Nalini Venkatasubramanian. The Different Dimensions of Dynamicity IEEE International Conference on Peer-to-Peer Systems (P2P). 2004.

Mayur Deshpande, Douglas C. Schmidt, Carlos O'Ryan, Darrell Brunsch. Design and Performance of Asynchronous Method Handling for CORBA. Distributed Objects and Applications (DOA). 2002.

Nalini Venkatasubramanian, Mayur Deshpande, Shivajit Mohapatra, Sebastian Gutierrez-Nolasco, Jehan Wickramasuriya. Design and Implementation of a Composable Reflective Middleware Framework. IEEE International Conference on Distributed Computer Systems (ICDCS). 2001.
